attributes.action: standardise and fund child friendly teaching materials
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recent media attention focuses on commendable Uk govt legislation to protect children from fraudulent internet use - please discuss in parliament, therefore, what legitimate web pages can be used by home tutors and public secotr educators. There are lots of good resources springing up - cited in education press resource lists, developed by individuals, companies and teaching professionals - but there is very little detailed govt advice on this, which means individuals unfairly come under fire. Please consider also funding and endorsing my web page to reassure parents.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
